thread.title: BRIEF-Sinclair Broadcast Says Co, Tribune Media Agreed With DOJ To Extend Tribune Merger Related Timing Agreement End Date

title: BRIEF-Sinclair Broadcast Says Co, Tribune Media Agreed With DOJ To Extend Tribune Merger Related Timing Agreement End Date

organizations.name: doj to extend tribune merger related timing agreement end date reuters

text:
#Market News February 6, 2018 / 4:34 PM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-Sinclair Broadcast Says Co, Tribune Media Agreed With DOJ To Extend Tribune Merger Related Timing Agreement End Date Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Sinclair Broadcast Group Inc: 
* SINCLAIR BROADCAST SAYS CO, TRIBUNE MEDIA AGREED WITH DOJ TO EXTEND TRIBUNE MERGER RELATED TIMING AGREEMENT END DATE UNTIL FEB 11 - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2FSw0Qb ) Further company coverage:
